org.anchoranalysis.plugin.opencv.bean.feature

Class HOGFeature

  • Object
    • AnchorBean<B>
      • InitializableBean<Feature<T>,FeatureInitParams>
        • Feature<FeatureInputStack>
          • FeatureStack
            • HOGFeature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParamsInitializer<FeatureInitParams>

    public class HOGFeature
extends FeatureStack
    One part of a Histogram of Oriented Gradients descriptor, as applied to an image stack.

    See OpenCV HOGDescriptor documentation for details of implementation.

    Author:
    Owen Feehan
